abstract: Iranian supreme leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei's unusual remarks about eliminating the position of president highlights increasingly bitter struggle within the country's political elite as the leader and his allies continue to try to undercut the powers of Iranian Pres Mahmoud Ahmadinejad.
snippet: Ayatollah Ali Khamenei’s remarks about a parliamentary system in Iran were seen as the latest blow in his battle with President Mahmoud Ahmadinejad.
lead_paragraph: Ayatollah Ali Khamenei’s remarks about a parliamentary system in Iran were seen as the latest blow in his battle with President Mahmoud Ahmadinejad.

headline.main: Iran’s Power Struggle Goes Beyond Personalities to Future of Presidency Itself
headline.print_headline: Iran’s Power Struggle Goes Beyond Personalities to Future of Presidency Itself
headline.seo: In Iran Rivalry, Khamenei Takes on Presidency Itself
